s1.title: Textpad
s1.p: Dr.M.L.Noone developed this cool editor and has it's source repository under the Giant Java Tree. It is GPL and we took a snapshot at the end of November and adapted it to run under Jesktop. It does so very well and is a example of an extremely polished application. Well done Dr Noone. We have donated the source changes back to Dr Noone (it still runs in standalone mode) and he may, if he chooses, formalize the Jesktop compatibility.
